articles.title: Greetings to Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian President
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Hassan Rouhani, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on Feb. 10 on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution of Iran.
					 The message said that the Islamic Republic of Iran is now waging a dynamic struggle to oppose high-handed and arbitrary practices and dominationism of big powers, defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve its development.
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in all fields, sincerely wishing the president and people of Iran greater success in their future work.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian FM
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of greeting to his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif on Wednesday on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution of Iran.
					 Expressing belief that the exchange and cooperation between the foreign ministries of the two countries for the development of the traditional DPRK-Iran cooperative relations would grow stronger, the message wished the Iranian foreign minister good health and greater success in his work.

articles.title: Personages of Nigeria, Iran Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Personages of Nigeria, Iran Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, the chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran and the chairman of the International TaekwonÔºçDo Association in Iran paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassy in their countries between Jan. 27 and Feb. 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid bouquets before the fine art work of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria sincerely wished Marshal Kim Jong Un good health and great success in his noble work for leading the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and build a thriving nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran praised Kim Jong Il as the most distinguished patriot and great leader who devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung, shattered the U.S. imperialists' moves for stifling the DPRK and firmly defended its sovereignty and dignity with his Songun politics, the chairman noted, adding Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Successful Launch of Satellite Hailed by Provincial and City Rallies
articles.content:
Successful Launch of Satellite Hailed by Provincial and City Rallies
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in South Phyongan, Jagang and South Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City on Wednesday to hail the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 Present at the rallies were officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, factories, enterprises, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and youths and students.
					
					 A report of the National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK was read out to be followed by congratulatory speeches at the rallies.
					
					 Speakers said that having put the satellite of Juche on its orbit is the highest tribute the Workers' Party of Korea and people paid to leader Kim Jong Il and a proud victory won in the general advance to glorify the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as the one of victors and glory.
					
					 The great deed strikingly demonstrating the general national power of Juche Korea fully proved that no force on earth can block the army and people of the DPRK from dynamically advancing toward a bright future under the leadership of the great party, they noted.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers are kicking up a provocative racket, taking issue with the DPRK's successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4, but satellites of Juche will be launched into the sky above the country in the future, too, they said.
					
					 They called for performing heroic feats in the struggle to bring earlier the bright future of thriving Korea, bearing deep in mind the great national pride and honor of making a revolution, holding in high esteem Marshal Kim Jong Un as the top leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful Launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 Here
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful Launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 Here
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Occupiers of space who demonstrated before the world the DPRK's determination by successfully putting earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 into its orbit arrived in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					 The routes from the Three-Revolution Exhibition House to Ryonghung crossroads, Kaesonmun and Changjon streets, etc. were crowded with hundreds of thousands of people from all walks of life.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army and officials concerned greeted the contributors to the satellite launch before the Three-Revolution Exhibition House.
					
					 The buses carrying them entered in Changjon Street via the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 They headed for the April 25 Hotel passing through Okryu Bridge.

articles.title: Art Performance Given to Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Art Performance Given to Mark Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by art groups of university students at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 It began with narrative poem immortal masterpiece "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee". Put on the stage were colorful numbers prepared by the members of the art groups of university students including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Phyongsong University of Coal Mining, Wonsan University of Agriculture and Chongjin University of Education No. 2.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the patriotic devoted service of Kim Jong Il who made high-intensity forced march for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people all his life.
					
					 Also put in the stage were numbers showing the outlook on the love of the rising generation by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is glorifying the DPRK into the country of education and the power of talents, true to the intention of the great leaders.
					
					 Among them were numbers reflecting the burning resolution of the students to become the pillars and talents supporting the country by devoting their youth and enthusiasm to it.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Sang Gon, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned and teachers and students of universities in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Greater Leap Forward in Wake of Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Greater Leap Forward in Wake of Successful Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) --The earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 was a manifestation of the greatest glory to and the profound reverence for leader Kim Jong Il and a gift of most intense loyalty presented by our space scientists and technicians to Marshal Kim Jong Un, our dignified party, state and people, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial. It goes on:
					 The satellite of dignified Juche Korea, the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea and the great Korean people means an independent stand of the DPRK and the great national power.
					
					 "Break through the cutting edge!" This was the important behest of Kim Jong Il and strategic slogan of our party which attaches the greatest importance to science and technology.
					
					 The earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 represents the strong power of the DPRK, a scientific and technological power shining thanks to Kim Jong Il's patriotism. 
					
					 The spectacular success made in the satellite launch was a historic deed as it demonstrated before the world once again that no force on earth can prevent the DPRK from exercising the right to use space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The scientists and technicians of the DPRK National Aerospace Development Administration succeeded in putting the newly developed earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 into its orbit according to the 2016 plan of the 5-year program for national aerospace development. This was an exercise of its inviolable right.
					
					 Let us bring about great leap forward and innovations in building a thriving nation in the same spirit as what we displayed in successfully launching the Juche-oriented satellite. This is the unanimous will of service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The editorial calls upon them to make all-out charge with the great pride and honor of living and struggling in the dignified great Paektusan nation in order to more strikingly demonstrate the might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and glorify the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as the one of victors and glory.

articles.title: Sycophancy and Dependence on Outsiders Lead to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sycophancy and Dependence on Outsiders Lead to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Some countries are now making attempts to achieve economic development and prosperity by overcoming difficulties in reliance upon outside forces, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 This is very dangerous as it makes the nation mean and feeble and, in the long run, leads the country to ruin, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 If one depends on other countries and reads their faces, one cannot have one's own view but has to dance to the tune of others.
					
					 It is foolish to try to benefit from others while depending on them, not believing in one's own strength. To do so is self-destruction in the present world where the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists are rampant. 
					
					 Aggression and plunder are the nature of imperialism and remain unchanged. It is little short of pricking one's own eyes with one's own fingers to pin hope on "aid" and "cooperation" of the imperialists, failing to discern it.
					
					 Clear is the aim of "aid" touted by the imperialists. Through "aid" they seek to subjugate the backward countries and those countries which incur their displeasure politically and economically and westernize all fabrics of the social life in a bid to establish their order.
					
					 The only way out for the countries aspiring after independence and progress is to build their own strength and settle everything by dint of it in the spirit that everything for one's own is the best and self-development is the best. This is the only way for the nation and the country to live and prosper.
					
					 The achievements and experience gained by the DPRK, recording only a history of victory, clearly prove that self-development serves as a weapon for winning sure victory and its source.

articles.title: Actions Disclosing Injustice of Humiliating "Agreement" Waged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions Disclosing Injustice of Humiliating "Agreement" Waged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea waged an action for rejecting the humiliating "agreement" in which Japan's crimes related to the sexual slavery were concealed, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The council clarified on Jan. 29 that it would direct all efforts to letting the international community know about the injustice of the recent "agreement" on the sexual slavery reached between Japan and the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The organization submitted a written request to the UN in the joint name with women's organizations in Canada recently.
					
					 The request revealed that Japan and the south Korean authorities in the "agreement" thoroughly excluded the victims who had been forced to provide sex to the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The council is sending letters disclosing the injustice of the "agreement" and calling for lending an ear to the voices of the victims to embassies of various countries in south Korea and missions of various countries in the UN.
					
					 The organization clarified that it would send a written petition to the UN Headquarters in the joint name with women's and human rights organizations the world over and conduct protest actions in various regions of the U.S. together with victims of the sexual slavery.
					
					 It also expressed its will to wrest Japan's apology and reparations for the hideous crimes against humanity on the occasion of the Asian solidarity meeting for the solution to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: Shaman's Rites by "Saenuri Party" inside Parliamentary Building Ridiculed
articles.content:
Shaman's Rites by "Saenuri Party" inside Parliamentary Building Ridiculed
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are resorting to funny acts to realize their ambition for staying in power, touching off public derision and denunciation.
					 There took place shaman's rites inside the building of the "National Assembly" of south Korea on Jan. 29.
					
					 The rites were planned by the "Saenuri Party" with an aim to win in the upcoming April general election.
					
					 Irony is that in the rites whose alleged theme was the "prosperity and fortune of the country" hundreds of shamans prayed for the victory in the elections.
					
					 The news immediately sparked off censure from the public in south Korea.
					
					 Yonhap News, Newsis and other media vividly reflected what desperate efforts the representative and spokesman and the religious chairman of the "Saenuri Party" made to put the situation under control after the disclosure of the fact.
					
					 The religious chairman made lame excuses, saying that he only offered the place, not spearheading the event.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Brazil
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Brazil
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) was formed on Feb. 3.
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the sacred revolutionary careers and feats of the peerlessly great persons and significantly organize a meeting, seminar, film show, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events on the above-said occasions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Polish Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Polish Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish" on its website on February 2.
					 The work published on May 5, Juche 80 (1991) clarifies the sure victory of socialism, solidity of Korean socialism, secret of its indestructibility and essential nature.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted by Austrian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Posted by Austrian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted leader Kim Jong Il's brief biography on its website on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary).

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Guinean Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Guinean Personage
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who doubles as chairman of the Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) issued a statement on Feb. 2 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The birth of Kim Jong Il was a great event of weighty historic significance for progressive mankind struggling for independence, the statement said.
					
					 He developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and thus glorified it as the guiding idea in the era of independence and firmly defended socialism with his Songun politics, it noted.
					
					 He provided the guidelines clearly indicating the way to be followed by progressive mankind with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities, it said, adding the great feats he performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will shine forever.
					
					 It said that the Korean people are dynamically advancing along the road indicated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, full of the conviction of victory, holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in the highest posts of the party and state.

articles.title: Special Bulletin Issued in Guinea
articles.content:
Special Bulletin Issued in Guinea
Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) and the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association jointly issued a special bulletin "Birth of Kimjongilia" on Feb. 3.
					 The bulletin explained in detail the immortal flower in articles titled "How Kimjongilia was bred" and "Feature of Kimjongilia." 
					
					 It said:
					
					 The meaning and value of Kimjongilia lie in that it fully represents the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man. 
					
					 The pure red color of the flower symbolizes his noble idea, unshakable faith and tireless extraordinary enthusiasm. The high quality of the famous flower is clearly manifested in the large flower, and the high spirit of the peerlessly great man is reflected in the big and strong stalk.
					
					 Its leaves look like human hearts and its color symbolizes peace, friendship and justice.
					
					 Indeed, Kimjongilia is the flower praising the great man from its color to leaves.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencias a presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencias a presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un remitio el dia 9 un mensaje de condolencias a Bashar Al-Assad, presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Le expreso mis mas profundas condolencias y consuelo al recibir la triste noticia del fallecimiento de la senora Anisa Makhlouf, viuda del presidente Hafez Al-Assad, eterno lider de avance del pueblo arabe de Siria y madre de Vd.
					
					Estoy convencido de que Vd. logre mayores victorias en la justa lucha por defender la soberania y la seguridad del pais al cambiar el dolor de perdida por la fuerza y coraje.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 37o aniversario de triunfo de revolucion islamica de Iran
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 37o aniversario de triunfo de revolucion islamica de Iran
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este miercoles un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran, Hassan Rouhani, con motivo del 37o aniversario del triunfo de la revolucion islamica de Iran. 
					La misiva senala que en la actualidad la Republica Islamica de Iran libra una dinamica lucha por defender la soberania nacional y lograr el desarrollo del pais rechazando el despotismo, la arbitrariedad y el dominacionismo de las potencias. 
					
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se amplien y se desarrollen mas en todas las esferas, desea de todo corazon al mandatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en sus trabajos posteriores.

articles.title: Continuan mitines de militares y civiles para festejar lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
articles.content:
Continuan mitines de militares y civiles para festejar lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 10 los mitines de militares y civiles de las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Jagang y de Hamgyong del Sur y de la ciudad de Nampho para felicitar el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4. 
					Asistieron alli los funcionarios de los organismos locales del partido y el poder, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades, etc., oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes. 
					
					En los mitines se dio lectura a la informacion de la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Cosmico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y hubo discursos de felicitacion. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite Kwangmyongsong-4 deviene el mas sublime homenaje dirigido al Dirigente Kim Jong Il por el partido y el pueblo de la RPDC y el triunfo orgulloso alcanzado por ellos en la marcha general para acoger el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como conclave de triunfadores y de gloria. 
					
					Ratificaron que el presente acontecimiento manifesto plenamente el poderio general de la Corea del Juche y volvio a demostrar al mundo entero que nadie puede detener el avance vigoroso del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que marchan a galopes hacia el futuro radiante bajo la orientacion del gran partido. 
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites arman alborotos provocativos cuestionando el lanzamiento exitoso de Kwangmyongsong-4, pero se lanzaran uno tras otro los satelites de la Corea del Juche, apuntaron. 
					
					Expusieron decisiones de registrar meritos heroicos en la lucha por adelantar el futuro radiante de la Corea prospera guardando en lo profundo del corazon el gran orgullo y dignidad nacionales de tener al Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el supremo puesto del PTC y de la Revolucion Coreana.

articles.title: Servilismo y dependencia llevan a pais y nacion al arruinamiento, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Servilismo y dependencia llevan a pais y nacion al arruinamiento, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ACNC) -- Algunos paises tratan de superar las dificultades y lograr el desarrollo economico y la prosperidad del pais mediante el servilismo a las grandes potencias y la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras. Esto es un proceder muy peligroso que convierte a una nacion en la humillante e impotente y arruina el pais. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este miercoles y continua:
					
					Si un pais depende de las fuerzas extranjeras observando su actitud, actua al son de ellas sin tener su propio criterio. 
					
					En el mundo actual en que predominan el despotismo y las arbitrariedades de los imperialistas, el intento de sacar provecho ateniendose a otros sin confiar en sus propias fuerzas lleva al pais a la autodestruccion. 
					
					La agresion y el saqueo es la naturaleza del imperialismo.
					
					Es una absurdidad depositar la esperanza en la "ayuda" y "cooperacion" de los imperialistas. 
					
					La "ayuda" de los imperialistas persigue el objetivo de subyugar en lo politico y economico los paises subdesarrollados y los que no le agradan y establecer el orden a estilo occidental en esos paises. 
					
					La unica via para los paises aspirantes a la independencia y el progreso es cultivar su propia fuerza y resolver lo todo apoyandose en sus propias fuerzas. 
					
					Los exitos y experiencias de la RPDC que sale siempre victoriosa prueban que el autofortalecimiento es el remedio todopoderoso y fuente de todas las victorias.
